Popover Menu Example

This example demonstrates native Popover API for navigation menus. Click the "Menu" or user avatar buttons to see the popovers.

Features Used

  • popover attribute for auto-dismiss behavior
  • popovertarget for declarative triggers
  • CSS anchor positioning (position-anchor)
  • @starting-style for entry animations
  • light-dark() for automatic dark mode
